author: Simon Difford
description: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Special ingredient #1: Orange peel infused Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato Special ingredient #2: Cherry balsamic & cola reduction shrub at 4:3 ratio
name: The Usual
